languages.text: {n}Тщательно исследовав тела каторжников, надзиратели пришли к выводу, что убиты они были не людьми — никто не знал оружия, оставляющего подобные раны. Тела были предъявлены бунтарям, и мятеж угас — все осознали, что иная сила стоит за данным убийством.{/n}

{n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тщательно исследовав тела каторжников, надзиратели пришли к выводу, что убиты они были не людьми — никто не знал оружия, оставляющего подобные раны. Тела были предъявлены бунтарям, и мятеж угас — все осознали, что иная сила стоит за данным убийством.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens have concluded that they have not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot had died down — everyone had realised that an unknown force is behind this murder.{/n}

{n}Carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the wardens have concluded that they have not been killed by a human — nobody could identify the weapon that would inflict such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot had died down — everyone had realised that an unknown force is behind this murder.{/n}

The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down — everyone realised that some unknown force was behind these murders.{/n}

The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

{n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}监察员仔细检查了那些囚犯的尸体，断定他们并不是被人类杀害的，因为没有任何已知武器能造成这样的伤口。这些尸体被展示给所有犯人，之后这场骚动便平息了下来。每个人都意识到，杀害了无数人的幕后黑手是某种未知的存在。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}监察员仔细检查了那些囚犯的尸体，断定他们并不是被人类杀害的，因为没有任何已知武器能造成这样的伤口。这些尸体被展示给所有犯人，之后这场骚动便平息了下来。每个人都意识到，杀害了无数人的幕后黑手是某种未知的存在。{/n}
{n}监察员仔细检查了那些囚犯的尸体，断定他们并不是被人类杀害的，但没人能辨认出他们究竟是被什么武器杀死的。这些尸体被展示给所有犯人，之后这场骚动便平息了下来。每个人都意识到，这无数场谋杀背后是某种未知的势力。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras inspeccionar en detalle los cadáveres de los convictos, los supervisores concluyeron que no habían muerto a manos de ningún humano, ya que ningún arma podría haber infligido heridas similares. Se permitió a los convictos ver los cuerpos y la revuelta llegó a su fin cuando comprendieron que había una fuerza desconocida tras los asesinatos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras inspeccionar en detalle los cadáveres de los convictos, los supervisores concluyeron que no habían muerto a manos de ningún humano, ya que ningún arma podría haber infligido heridas similares. Se permitió a los convictos ver los cuerpos y la revuelta llegó a su fin cuando comprendieron que había una fuerza desconocida tras los asesinatos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}受刑者らの遺体を入念に調べた結果、看守らは、人間によって殺されたのではないと結論づけた...そのような傷を負わせる凶器を誰一人として特定できなかったのだ。遺体が受刑者らに公開されると、暴動は収まった...すべての者が、この殺人事件の背後には未知の力が働いていることに気づいたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}受刑者らの遺体を入念に調べた結果、看守らは、人間によって殺されたのではないと結論づけた...そのような傷を負わせる凶器を誰一人として特定できなかったのだ。遺体が受刑者らに公開されると、暴動は収まった...すべての者が、この殺人事件の背後には未知の力が働いていることに気づいたのだ。{/n}
{n}受刑者らの遺体を入念に調べた結果、看守らは、人間によって殺されたのではないと結論づけた...そのような傷を負わせる凶器を誰一人として特定できなかったのだ。遺体が受刑者らに公開されると、暴動は収まった...すべての者が、この殺人事件の背後には未知の力が働いていることに気づいたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En examinant minutieusement les cadavres, les contremaîtres en concluent qu'ils n'ont pas été tués par un humain, aucune arme connue n'aurait pu infliger de telles blessures. Les corps sont montrés aux détenus et l'émeute se calme, tout le monde réalisant que ces meurtres ont forcément été commis par une entité inconnue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En examinant minutieusement les cadavres, les contremaîtres en concluent qu'ils n'ont pas été tués par un humain, aucune arme connue n'aurait pu infliger de telles blessures. Les corps sont montrés aux détenus et l'émeute se calme, tout le monde réalisant que ces meurtres ont forcément été commis par une entité inconnue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nach einer sorgfältigen Untersuchung der Leichen der Gefangenen kamen die Aufseher zu dem Schluss, dass sie nicht von Menschen getötet wurden ... keine bekannte Waffe konnte derartige Wunden verursachen. Die Leichen wurden den Sträflinge gezeigt, und der Aufstand legte sich, als alle erkannten, dass irgendeine unbekannte Macht hinter den Morden steckte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer sorgfältigen Untersuchung der Leichen der Gefangenen kamen die Aufseher zu dem Schluss, dass sie nicht von Menschen getötet wurden ... keine bekannte Waffe konnte derartige Wunden verursachen. Die Leichen wurden den Sträflinge gezeigt, und der Aufstand legte sich, als alle erkannten, dass irgendeine unbekannte Macht hinter den Morden steckte.{/n}

{n}Nach einer sorgfältigen Untersuchung der Leichen der Gefangenen sind die Wärter zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass sie nicht von einem Menschen getötet worden waren. Niemand konnte die Waffe identifizieren, die solche Wunden verursacht. Die Leichen wurden den Sträflingen gezeigt, und der Aufstand legte sich ... Allen war klar, dass irgendeine unbekannte Macht hinter diesen Morden steckte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hükümlülerin cesetlerini titizlikle inceleyen gözetmenler, insan eliyle öldürülmediklerine kanaat getirdi. Bu yaralara hiçbir bilindik silah sebep olmuş olamazdı. Cesetler mahkûmlara gösterildikten sonra cinayetlerin ardında meçhul bir kudret olduğu ayyuka çıktı ve isyan dindi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Upon carefully inspecting the dead bodies of the convicts, the overseers concluded that they had not been killed by a human — no known weapon could have inflicted such wounds. The bodies were demonstrated to the convicts, and the riot died down as the realisation sank in that some unknown force was behind the murders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hükümlülerin cesetlerini titizlikle inceleyen gözetmenler, insan eliyle öldürülmediklerine kanaat getirdi. Bu yaralara hiçbir bilindik silah sebep olmuş olamazdı. Cesetler mahkûmlara gösterildikten sonra cinayetlerin ardında meçhul bir kudret olduğu ayyuka çıktı ve isyan dindi.{/n}
